<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Song of Marching](/Feats.aspx?ID=4601) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You learn the [_song of marching_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1774) composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.
name: Song of Marching
